attributes.action: Let Belinda the cat back in Tesco.
attributes.additional_details: Allow Belinda back in the store where she has been staying for the last few years!!
attributes.background: Belinda the cat has been visiting Sunbury Tesco for a couple of years now, they have always let her in the store, someone complained and now belinda is being chased away by the managers which is causing stress and upset for her. We demand Belinda is allowed back into store.
